attributes.action: Force the resignation of Judge Mowat who let a man convicted of child porn possesion walk out of a court with no punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the police and the Ministry of Justice.
reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
